titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Forasmuch as her Maiestie doeth vnderstand that the statutes made hertofore for the maintenance and increase of the game of phesants and partridges ...
Proclamations. 1602-09-15
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Forbidding the hunting of game fowl near the Queen's residences.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
